original_title: 18-year-old dies in wild elephant attack in Sigiriya
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); An 18-year-old youth has died due to a wild elephant attack in Kimbissa, Sigiriya.
Sri Lanka Police said he had been at a friend's house, when a wild elephant had attacked the house.
Sri Lanka Police added that he had died after a wall of the house had collapsed.
